boardgame.name: King of New York
New York Királya
Potwory w Nowym Jorku
Повелитель Нью-Йорка
紐約之王
boardgame.description: There's always something happening in the city that never sleeps. Maybe it's the lights, maybe it's the energy, or maybe it's the giant monsters trying to demolish the place!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;King of New York is a standalone game from designer Richard Garfield that keeps the core ideas of King of Tokyo while introducing new ways to play. As in KoT, your goal is to be the first monster to collect 20 victory points (VPs) or to be the last monster standing. On your turn, you roll six dice up to three times, then carry out the actions on those dice. Claws cause damage to other monsters, hearts heal damage to yourself, and energy is stored up so that you can purchase power cards that provide unique effects not available to anyone else._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;What's new in King of New York is that you can now try to become a star in the big city; more specifically, you can achieve _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Fame_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, which nets you VPs, but superstar status is fleeting, so enjoy your time in the spotlight._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game board for King of New York is larger than in KoT with each monster occupying a district in the city and everyone trying to shine in Manhattan. When you attack, you can displace a monster in another district, whether to escape military forces or to find new smashing opportunities. Yes, smashing because you can now destroy buildings and get bonuses for doing so, but the more destruction you cause, the more intense the military response._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The monsters from King of New York can be used in KoT and vice versa, but the power cards are specific to this game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

All items will be posted next business day and should be with you within 3 days. Thanks for looking and have a great game! (If you are looking to ship to mainland Europe, this will increase the price) Seller: crispy116

IELLO (IEL51170) There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s always something happening in the city that never sleeps. Maybe it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the lights, maybe it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the energy, or maybe it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the giant monsters trying to demolish the place! Get ready for Richard Garfield_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s follow up to the best-selling King of Tokyo! Who will be the King of New York? King of New York introduces lots of new ways to play, while still keeping the core ideas of King of Tokyo. There are Buildings to Stomp! Vengeful Military Units to Destroy! Six brand new Monsters! Every roll of the dice might mean that your monster feels the OUCH, as military units open fire. Will you grab the spotlight, and become a celebrity Superstar? Or will you become the defender of the city, and befriend Lady Liberty? Each of New York_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s boroughs has its own charms, but to truly rule the Big Apple, you have to control Manhattan. Defeat the other monsters and rule the city... Become the King of New York!

Become the King of New York!
2-6 players (Iello) Languages: English
